MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Leven, affecting properties in Coldstream Crescent and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:20pm due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. Our emergency response team is currently onsite carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:47pm on  Monday, 18 January 2021
